documents.document: @andromedasowner it was a pretty good bad idea. In case any of you ever decide to stay up for 35 hours: don't
I spent my day staring lovingly at the likenesses/actual people who were involved with Comet. https://t.co/b1CENQc9tZ
Got row AA but apparently not actually front row https://t.co/cVo93fOvhF
@mkwiles I just got to see Waitress on Broadway from the third row and tomorrow I'm seeing Josh Groban's Broadway show.
MOLLY^2^2 https://t.co/AxRrwiRy02
@StephanieTorns Didn't get to talk to you at the stage door but I was in the third row and you were just so vibrant on stage. Absolute joy.
29 hours without sleep. Is going to another show tonight a pretty good bad idea or a pretty bad bad idea?
I'm seeing @mollyejobe as Jenna and NOTHING ELSE MATTERS MOLLYS OF THE MOTHERFREAKIN WOOOORLD
Forward my mail to https://t.co/QU9IfGY4Kk
I've been literally awake for 24 hours straight BUT I am in row G for Dear Evan Hansen tomorrow so I'm not mad!
@princesss_alex_ reminding me to celebrate the little victories https://t.co/gEuOszAwT4
Well I was going to go to two shows today but I don't think I can make it. I'll swing a matinee but that's it.
Okay but who's playing Jenna in Waitress today That's all I want to know
"When do you think you'll be back?" I've been awake for 19 hours I'm not currently capable of thought at all
Someone asked me if I needed help and I almost burst into tears.
I have a metro card with 19 dollars but I don't know how much that is can someone give me a sense of if that's a lot or not
Sunrise is pretty tho https://t.co/Q49Y6O5KTB
This is what seventeen hours straight of travel does to a person. I feel a lot more dead than I look. https://t.co/ToieiZ7Zub
New idea: instead of going to any of the shows I just stay at JFK until it's time to go home.
First thing I heard my seat partner say was "Shit." We're off to a great start.
'How old do you think I am?!' I angrily think before remembering I am literally clutching a stuffed animal
In a shocking turn of events, it's raining in Seattle.
Finally on our first plane! https://t.co/IPaaIRp0o2
Sonya is doing her civic duty https://t.co/h1wBicMv4W
Aaaaand my flight has been delayed The SLC airport is a hellscape I will never be free from
@CathrynWake Thanks!! I'm lucky enough to be on the stage so I'm sure I will!!
@andromedasowner I cleverly planned this trip with another two and a half hours in the SLC airport
Andromeda are on our bus to SLC! https://t.co/554EPN0KSv
@CathrynWake ...it to someone to give to you! Thanks!
@CathrynWake I am a tourist from Idaho so I'm not sure if I'll ever be back (though this is my second trip to see it!) so I'll just give...
@CathrynWake is there any chance you'll be around on Sunday or should I give it to someone and ask them to give it to you?
@CathrynWake are you back at Comet yet? I made you a present and would hate to miss you.
@TheLucasSteele was sure nominated in an interesting category for the Elliot Norton Awards according to Wikipedia. https://t.co/jUaU8UXz1R
I got a new coat! https://t.co/uNtxglKNdT
@andromedasowner I sure hope the answer is yes! https://t.co/UUcTmin7Z1
Can I fingerprint with acrylics? Asking for a friend who is me
This is my final count of bears for the Great Comet cast. I hope they like them! https://t.co/29D2Jh5GKO
@princesss_alex_ You never know when I might need to get a hold of her!
@andromedasowner I put them in my phone so I can call them easily when I'm concerned about things https://t.co/BChSeWGpP3
I'm shaking but I just called my senator for the first time!!!
I feel like I made him a bear so I should make Groban a card but I also feel like that's dumb because he's Groban, he already has a billion.
I broke a hairbrush this morning in my hair.
It's my private place for thinking. https://t.co/k514cUZDW5
The good news is each room has its own thermostat, so I can keep my room twenty degrees warmer than the rest of the house if I so choose.
Listening to @PrairieEmpire is making my first night in my new state a liiiiittle easier.
@blaynes5 We sang a modified version of I Know Him about our neighbor does that count
How long before this new place actually feels like home?
And now the house is a home https://t.co/7RVazvhQyA
My last walk through of the house. ):
Theodosia is perfectly comfortable in the moving trailer. https://t.co/3IY1gTnWSV
I enjoy self-deprecating humor because it satisfies my mean sense of humor without hurting others.
@andromedasowner what I wake up to this morning https://t.co/HJWxJLwESb
Never Underestimate The Power Of Being A Shrill Bitch: an autobiography/self-help book
@andromedasowner that's the most she could cheat? https://t.co/2hw9Mo1Tcm
My mom is trying so hard, I love her so much. https://t.co/nU31B26XGA
Why is my hair like this https://t.co/CQwHI4kAmz
You try saying goodbye to one of your best friends while @brittainashford Sonya Alone is playing and not crying because it is impossible 😭😭😭
I left for eleven hours. This is my room now. I really love what they've done with the place. https://t.co/5DXSZrBP5X
@GreatCometBway I saw a picture of Groban as Pierre I had never seen before and stopped breathing for fifteen seconds.
My friend the librarian bought me the Great Comet book as a going away present. I'm crying and I haven't opened it. https://t.co/Qd5zj7oJaK
The UPS guy who delivers to my work gave me a five dollar Starbucks gift card as a going away present. I don't even know his name.
My hair has just enough of mama's curl to go rogue when I try to brush it https://t.co/6IDJYC3CNl
My coworkers decided to have a surprise going away potluck party for me which is sweet but I ate before I came cause I didn't know
My phone corrected Batman to Bateman twice today And tried to do it just now Dang it Christian Bale get out of my autocorrect
Tried to welcome a friend to the Comet fandom the way @GreatCometBway would. He wasn't having it. https://t.co/DSE5tyQRfd
I'm THIS close to quoting along with the intercom.
She DOESN'T MIND being used as a cushion https://t.co/DkmqgtdTOt
@princesss_alex_ you wound me
@princesss_alex_ Once upon a time there was a magical land where it never rained. The end.
I have six and a half hours to kill in the SLC airport. What should I do?
Someone on my plane just threatened to walk to Salt Lake City.
🎶 tell the world I'm coming home 🎶 https://t.co/zykxuPo43y
@feeltheheath @TheEnsemblist @GreatCometBway I got the beaver letter AND I LOVE IT WITH ALL MY HEART
My TSA agent just gave me a theatre review b/c of my Fun Home shirt. He thought the tour was better than the Broadway production.
@funhomemusical warmed my soul and made me feel whole again https://t.co/VScpa5dv6X
The @funhomemusical merch guy is not the hero we deserve but he's the one we needed and I love him.
It's important to always wear your seatbelt in case of unexpected rough air! https://t.co/HRnCOm25V2
Well That took an unexpected turn https://t.co/WdfPuP8NnS
@AlaskaAir if your app could stop switching where I'm supposed to board between gate C and gate N, that would be great.
@AlaskaAir I have been running around SeaTac like a headless chicken for an hour because of you. Thanks.
We seem to have the shuttle to ourselves. https://t.co/9GrnwCPXhE
Hello again, Seattle airport
I got through security in about ten minutes. That's a new record.
Andromeda and I are headed to the airport! https://t.co/TIcH7d2KNo
Can't be at a March in person but I'm there in spirit! https://t.co/ynIMBheO4r
Maybe my flight leaves in 13 hours and I haven't packed yet but Maple Avenue bears are done! https://t.co/bp3OmHF5vw
I show my Comet letter from @feeltheheath to pretty much everyone who comes to our house, whether they're there to visit me or not. 😬
I'm excited to see Fun Home this weekend but mostly excited to have real food.
I just spent an hour and a half cutting out clothes for bears AFTER taking a sleep pill. Surprised I still have all my fingers.
Showing friend my Comet bears. I put the Andrey bear face up. He immediately says "No, Molly, Andrey isn't here!" And flips it over.
"Plane tickets are expensive but we won't always be this poor." A friend just told me and words to live by tbh
I've watched the We Will Rise trailer six times in the past day and is just adding to my excitement
Once tonight was cancelled and now I'm really bummed out
@andromedasowner for those keeping track at home, they're DVI cables.
Me: I should go ask what these cables are but they'll think I'm dumb... *iPod shuffles into Brave* Me: ...You win this time, Sara Barielles.
The true gay agenda Having our story told by high quality actors (cred @blaynes5 ) https://t.co/iSUR4ZvsFd
@USPSHelp I'm still confused over here and I see you responding to other people
@rebekahmallen Rebekah word on the street is you thanked everyone named Ethan
https://t.co/F3QE9iLR3p I think it's time to bring back the first I heard and my FAVORITE song from Tigers which is now AWARD WINNING!! 🐯🎉🎊🐯
I AM RIDICULOUSLY PROUD RIGHT NOW YOU GUYS https://t.co/WgbySj3JlH
